_header: Qui plus expendit then his plough may till a twelvemonth
_description: Proverbial statement about expending too much — one long macaronic couplet

NottsULMeLm1.Transcription:
Qui plus expendit then his plought may tylle a
                        twelmounghNon admiretur thawe he borwe a loof at his
                    neyburgh
NottsULMeLm1.Note: Added by a hand of the fifteenth century.
